titleStmt.title: The letter from the commissioners of the Parliament of Scotland to the commissioners of both houses, concerning His Majesties coming to the Scotish Army Dated at Southwel the fifth of May. 1646.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Laurence Chapman,

notesStmt.note: Signed: by the Warrant and Command of the Commissioners for the Parliament of Scotland. Lothian.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
